short_description: 26-POCKET MONTHLY FILE ORGANIZER: The ABC life 26-Pocket Accordion File Organizer is the perfect solution for organizing tax documents and monthly family bills. With product dimensions of 13" x 9.4", it fits Letter/A4 Size papers perfectly and keeps your important documents systematically arranged.

HUGE CAPACITY & SELF-STANDING: This expandable file folder extends up to 28 inches and holds up to 4,500 sheets of paper. It stands upright securely on your desk for easy access, and the sturdy construction ensures it won't tip over even when fully loaded.

LARGER TABS FOR EASY CATEGORIZATION: Features upgraded 1/3 cut tabs that are larger and easier to read, allowing for detailed labeling. The unique colorful inner pockets and included A-Z labels help you classify files alphabetically and find what you need in seconds.

UPGRADED POCKET HEIGHT & VERSATILE STORAGE: We optimized the design so files no longer cover the index tabs. It serves as your central home document center—perfect for organizing W-2s and 1099s for tax season, safeguarding mortgage deeds, auto titles, and insurance policies, or even archiving kids' school artwork and medical records. Keep vital family documents safe and ready for instant retrieval.

DURABLE & WATER-RESISTANT MATERIAL: Constructed from high-quality, Polypropylene (PP) that is waterproof and tear-resistant. Unlike cheap paper folders, this sturdy organizer protects your vital documents from moisture, spills, and daily wear, ensuring your files stay safe for years.
